title: Snacktime: Who Is 'Batbrat?'
dc:creator: WBUR
description: A Redditor named ‘batbrat’ has been quietly solving mysteries for years – identifying everything from a Victorian mourning ring from the 1800s to a single bone of a deer – and others have started to take notice. "Who are you?," one Redditor asked. In today's Snacktime, we find out...
itunes:author: WBUR
